original_text: Then Moses said to them, ‘You must read this Law to all the Israelites. Read it every seven years at the Feast of Huts, in the year when you forgive people's debts. At that time all the Israelites will go to the place that the Lord your God will choose. When they meet there to worship the Lord, they must listen to this Law.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘이 네 하나님 여호와 앞 그가 택하신 곳에 모일 때에 이 율법을 낭독하여 온 이스라엘에게 듣게 할지니

sentences.original_text: You must read this Law to all the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이 율법을 모든 이스라엘 백성에게 읽어야 한다

sentences.original_text: in the year when you forgive people's debts
At that time all the Israelites will go
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모든 이스라엘 백성이 갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: to the place that the Lord your God will choose
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 하나님 여호와께서 선택하실 그 곳으로

sentences.original_text: When they meet there to worship the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그곳에 모여 여호와를 경배할 때

sentences.original_text: they must listen to this Law
